Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game. Add a context menu to open someone's logs. Layout, style, stats, default metric, and more are all customizable in the settings.
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
- 2.1.4.3:
   Add zone ASP when hovering over an ASP stat.
   Fix an issue where old members would stay in group view even after a refresh.
   Add a button to open the main window in the installer.
- 2.1.4.2:
   [Penumbra integration] Use interface collection instead of default.
- 2.1.4.1:
   Refresh party state when swapping to party view.
   Add "party" or "p" argument to /fflogs to open the party view and refresh the party state.
   Add default view setting.
- 2.1.4.0:
   Add cDPS metric, this new metric only works on new reports.
